snippet.title: Ghost Master - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
"Grim spectres, howling banshees, and sly gremlins are yours to command as you unleash ghastly spirits on the town of Gravenville and scare the wits out of its citizens. In the world of the Ghost Master, spooks do your bidding, as you solve puzzles and unlock mysteries in a challenge that combines the best of strategy, adventure, and resource management games."

Developed by Sick Puppies (whose only other title they made prior to this was Pipe Mania 3D for the PSone), this PC game was a hit with critics and players alike when it came out back in 2003. And while its planned sequel was scrapped (though it did receive a free DLC patch that adds an "Epilogue" level to make up for the cliffhanger), Ghost Master has gained a cult following over the years, especially in Poland.

Ghost Master (C) Strategy First

#retrogames #retrogaming #steam #steamgames #steamgame #ghostmaster #empireinteractive #strategyfirst

FUN FACT: As a Polish fellow myself, I remember playing the demo, then eventually owning a full version as a free game with an issue of the Polish gaming magazine CyberMycha. The Polish version is fully dubbed and translated. In fact, you could say that the Polish dub is perhaps even funnier when compared to the original English. And while the Steam version does not contain the Polish version in the supported languages, the GOG re-release does come with the iconic dub, on top of including the game's soundtrack.
